summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York and an OPR recipient regarding coordination on the SDNY investigation of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss scheduling calls for deconfliction and discussion of respective matters.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the investigation being conducted by the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Initial contact regarding SDNY Epstein investigation
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from SDNY reaches out to an OPR contact to discuss deconfliction and coordination on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

events.title: Scheduling of coordination call
events.description: Multiple emails are exchanged to schedule a call between the SDNY AUSA and the OPR contact, with the AUSA noting they are in grand jury and meetings.

events.title: Follow-up request for discussion
events.description: A follow-up email is sent requesting to speak briefly, indicating ongoing coordination needs.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York is actively working on the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein as of February 2019.
The AUSA is seeking deconfliction and discussion with an OPR contact regarding their respective matters, indicating potential overlapping investigations or interests.
The correspondence shows ongoing coordination efforts spanning from February to July 2019.
The AUSA mentions being in grand jury proceedings related to the investigation in February 2019.
Multiple redacted names (OPR, DPR) appear in the email headers and body, indicating protected individuals or entities involved in the coordination.
